lyrics:
"Homeboys" lyrics Gucci Mane Lyrics "Homeboys" (feat. MPA Duke, Waka Flocka, Young Thug, Young Dolph & OG Boo Dirty) This is for my homeboys Motherfuckers, enemies Who's not keen on me is no friend of mine This is for my homeboys Who never changed a bit I'll switch it This is for my homeboys Pull up, they can make it And you see them at the County Jail Just waiting This is for my homeboys Yeah, now we've been together since junior high Skipping school and getting high There's no lie If I will have for it then he will have for it If I would fly for it Then he would fly for it And now we're fucked up And that's bad luck And now you can't get shit from it I thought I won't stop there I already knew what I would choose But you still can, and you still do Gotta be such rude and have rules You know I'm too tough to be rude I just can't Momma said I always had math and a tool I think about you every day Since the day you left me in the club going hard all night long Then the next morning I got a phone call That you've never made it home Shit! Now what the fuck is dead is fucked up Me and my kind made it up So we just looked up He did the shit anyway to get all the money This is for my homeboys Motherfuckers, enemies Who's not keen on me is no friend of mine This is for my homeboys Who never changed a bit No switching This is for my homeboys Pull up, they can make it And you see me at the County Jail Just waiting This is for my homeboys Yeah, now we've been together since junior high Skipping school and getting high There's no lie Now we bust at each other guns And this shit hurts My momma craves to sleep after the shit we're doing Before our kids start to think this is a bad influence Every time I go out People worry and ask you And I can't tell the world [?] Before I went to jail I wanted to make it right Yeah, I'm a millionaire This is for my homeboys Motherfuckers, enemies Who's not keen on me is no friend of mine This is for my homeboys Who never changed a bit No switching it I don't think he's hearing me I don't think he's feeling me No, they say they ain't scared of me Al I had was hustling Smile nigga, with a big heart No I got the must suit Mario we miss you Mario we miss you This is for my homeboys Motherfuckers, enemies Who's not keen on me is no friend of mine This is for my homeboys Who never changed a bit No switching This is for my homeboys Pull up, they can make it And you see them at the County Jail Just waiting This is for my homeboys Yeah, now we've been together since junior high Skipping school and getting high There's no lie if ( /Android|webOS|iPhone|iPod|iPad|BlackBerry|IEMobile|Opera Mini/i.test(navigator.userAgent) ) { document.getElementById('azmxmbanner').style.display='block'; document.write('
